blueMesh.display

Class RouterThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • blueMesh.display.RouterThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RouterThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class used to handle connectedThreads and route data coming into the connectedThreads and data generated by the user
    Author:
    schnej7
